SamPy.resolve.misc.generateFileLists.SOARFileLists¶

class SamPy.resolve.misc.generateFileLists.SOARFileLists(path=None, ext=0, idef='.fits')¶

Generates several different file lists based on different identifiers. This class can be useful when reducing data with IRAF which requires different file lists as input.

__init__(path=None, ext=0, idef='.fits')¶

Init

Methods

__init__([path, ext, idef]) Init
findParams([params]) Reads header keywords from each FITS file.
printFileInfo([fileInfo]) Prints file information to the screen
saveFileInfo([output, fileInfo]) Saves file information to a file
separateByParams()
note:this only works when the three default params have been used
